name: EvoCharge
0:
”Alexa, Ask EvoCharge to start charging”
”Alexa, Ask EvoCharge to stop charging”
”Alexa, Ask EvoCharge what is the status of my vehicle charger”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: evo charge
des:
Gain the ability to remotely start and stop charging sessions by using the commands below.
• "Alexa, ask EvoCharge to start charging"
• "Alexa, ask EvoCharge to stop charging"
• “Alexa, ask EvoCharge what is the status of my vehicle charger”
• “Alexa, ask EvoCharge how much did I last charge my vehicle”
